title: Too lazy for an auction - 8 T206's SOLD
author: buymycards

posts.post_title: Too lazy for an auction - 8 T206's SOLD
posts.post_content:
Hi,
I am selling a group of 8 lower grade T206's.  I would like to sell them as one lot for $125 which includes shipping and insurance.

Note that Demmitt has a rub mark over his right shoulder and $1.00 in pencil on the back.  Mowry has 283 written in pencil on the back.  All of the other cards have creases and wear issues.  McCormick has paperloss on the back.

You can send me a PM or an email @ [url]rickmcquillan@gmail.com[/url]

Thanks much!

Rick  CARDS ARE NOW SOLD
